whatr 0.0.1

Scrape Jeopardy game board

Source: R/whatr-board.R
whatr_board.Rd

This joins together the results of whatr_categories(), whatr_clues() and whatr_answers to return a single tibble with all clue/answer combinations.

whatr_board(game = NULL, date = NULL, show = NULL)

Arguments

game

The J-Archive! game ID number.
date

The original date an episode aired.
show

The sequential show number.

Value

A tibble of categories and positions.

Examples

whatr_board(game = 6304)
#> # A tibble: 61 x 4
#>        n category      clue                                    answer           
#>    <int> <chr>         <chr>                                   <chr>

#>  2    24 Picture The … If You Have These, It Means You're Wel… Your Ducks In A …
#>  3     7 Picture The … It's What's Going On Here               Comparing Apples…
#>  4     6 Picture The … Greenhouse Gas Emission Due To Human A… A Carbon Footpri…
#>  5     4 Picture The … Note The Lovely Weather; It Means To T… Make Hay While T…
#>  6    26 Literature    Melville's 'Bartleby The Scrivener' Is… Wall Street      
#>  7    23 Literature    In A 1923 Book By Kahlil Gibran, Almus… The Prophet      
#>  8    15 Literature    In 'Charlotte's Web', Templeton Is Thi… A Rat            
#>  9     3 Literature    In A Novel Simone De Beauvoir Depicted… (Albert) Camus   
#> 10     1 Literature    The Title Peak Of This Thomas Mann Nov… Magic Mountain   
#> # … with 51 more rows
